forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. South wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
As dusk descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the evening air is crisp and clear, perfect for those who enjoy a quiet stroll through the streets. With temperatures dipping to a cool 49 degrees, it’s advisable to don a light jacket, perhaps layered over a warm sweater to embrace the chill. The gentle south wind whispers through the city, offering a refreshing touch without being intrusive.

Tomorrow holds promise with sunny skies gracing the horizon, beckoning locals and visitors alike to venture outdoors. A high near 62 will lend itself well to afternoon activities, though it is likely to feel a bit cooler later in the day. The marine layer appears to be absent this night, allowing for a clear view of the stars, while the celebrated landmarks remain illuminated against the night sky. 

The serene conditions invite a myriad of simple pleasures—perhaps an evening walk along the Embarcadero or a leisurely dinner at a local café, relishing the beautifully crisp atmosphere. One might consider wrapping up the night with a warm drink, enjoying the calm anticipation of a golden day ahead.
